name: Slidebox
author: Arron Schaar, Daniel Buchner
description: A container that allows animated transitions between content panes, displaying all slides along the way. Think of the component as a filmstrip of slides that moves around in a viewport.

attributes.orientation: Slide axis. Set as 'x' for horizontal animations, and set as 'y' for vertical animations.

setters.orientation: Sets the slide axis as either 'x' or 'y'.

methods.slideTo: Slides to a specific element index.
methods.slideNext: Slides to the next slide element.
methods.slidePrevious: Slides to the previous slide element.

events.slideend: Fires at the end of each slide transition.
